Articles.Content:
I just achieved, non-Mechjeb, my most stable, circular orbit EVAR! I put this space station into a 200km orbit with Pe/Ap only 6 meters apart. Got lucky I guess! What's your best orbit?

Here's Bob posing for a picture:
My best circular orbit was within a meter of difference, but that was a right pain.

Wow 6m? How'd you pull that off with the PE and AP moving all over the place? I usually call it good enough once im within a few hundred meters. Call me lazy!

Congrats!
Grats !! I thought my 200m apart orbit was awesome xD guess I'm gonna launch some more orbiters then ^^ If I get any orbit 20 meters or less apart I'll be satisfied
